notes:
I beat the whole game but had to perform a simple tweak. Instruction below:

If after the first installation the game starts with a black screen and just sound,
Open in your text editor of choice the following file: "steamapps/compatdata/508980/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/Local Settings/Application Data/Crashday/config/graphics.config"
Change the value of "FSAA" from 2 to 0

After that, the game should run fine. It can sometimes crash during startup or while loading a level but I've only experienced such a crash once and I've beat the entire campaign. The initial startup screen shows 2 buttons with no text, select the left one to play. The second button opens a steam workshop mod manager which sadly crashes when you have any mods installed, so mods don't work.
title: Crashday Redline Edition

notes:
Works perfectly.
1) To fix black screen at launch open path_to_Steam_library/Steam/steamapps/compatdata/508980/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/Local Settings/Application Data/Crashday/config/graphics.config and change the value of "FSAA" from 2 to 0

2) The text on the buttons in the launcher (PLAY and MODS) doesn't appear.
title: Crashday Redline Edition
